questions.question: What is the predominant color of the displayed items?
Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of each item?
Based on visual texture, what is the apparent surface feel of the product?
Judging from the image, what material appears to constitute the items?
Considering the layering in the image, how many individual items are shown?
What is the general implied function or use of this object, based on visual cues?
From the image, describe the apparent thickness of each individual item?
Examining the edges, what kind of finish are the edges of each item showing?
Considering the image's lighting, what is the overall apparent sheen of the surface?
Does the product appear to have any discernible patterns or markings?
Based solely on the visual presentation, what is the implied weight of one item?
Considering the image's presentation, what is the apparent flexibility of the items?
In terms of surface uniformity, how consistent is the color across the items?
Focusing on the edges, are they sharply defined or softly rounded?
Judging by the overall look, does the item appear to be absorbent or non-absorbent?
